reviews.review: VALORANT é muito melhor, esse jogo é pra masoquista saudosista. Depois de 1500 horas de jogo, ficou tudo igual, vamos ver se é a mesma coisa com o concorrente.

Best competitive shooter out there. Easily.

This has got to be the worst fps game in my entire life. So many hackers rampant even in casual matches that the game is simply unbearable when it comes to comp games. No wonder this game is forever dead despite new updates are given by the developers but developers are so money-hungry that they only care about cosmetics and never bothered to see any actual reports or actively ban people.
I highly recommend other games compared to this trash.
